Meet one of our newest #NCTECHmembers that joined this November, Ten10. Organizations do not have enough tech talent to make the most of today‚Äôs opportunities. Tech is developing so quickly it‚Äôs hard to ensure even your existing teams evolve and adopt the skills they need. At the same time, talented people, with the potential to be great tech hires, don‚Äôt have the opportunity to learn and develop those skills. Ten10‚Äôs mission is to solve those problems. Our Tech Academy provides high caliber, diverse technology talent, selected and developed to provide the best combination of aptitude, relevance and cultural fit. We enable our clients to address their immediate and future tech talent needs. Our unique edge? We are technologists. This enables us to intelligently understand your tech skill requirements. __________________________ Are you interested in joining #NCTECH? New members receive one of two options: (1) complimentary registration to the Outlook for Tech in Charlotte, NC on Friday, February 2, 2024. OR (1) complimentary registration to the Diversity in Tech + Inclusion in the Triangle on Thursday, March 21, 2024. Learn More https://lnkd.in/d3_daKB

We at Red Hat are very excited to participate in the 2024 edition of Deutsche Telekom's Campus Fair, taking place from June 3rd to 4th at Landgrabenweg in Bonn. Embracing the theme "Discover. Innovate. Transform - Reimagine the Network," we are excited to connect with fellow industry professionals, showcase our latest technological advancements, and collaborate with DT's experts and the Telco Ecosystem. If you're a Deutsche Telekom employee, don't miss out on this exceptional event, now in its 8th consecutive year. We're eager to connect with you there. External attendees are welcome by invitation only. We look forward to innovative discussions with Deutsche Telekom about: - #OpenRAN and Red Hat - #TelcoCloud - A unified platform for running virtual machines and containers - Bringing #AI-enabled apps to production faster - check out our recent product announcements on AI during the recent Red Hat Summit in Denver. https://lnkd.in/eYqCySN5 - #Open innovation in telecommunications #telekomcampusfair2024 #leadingdigitaltelco #innovation #sustainability #AI #greentelco Deutsche Telekom Cloud Services Deutsche Telekom Global Business T-Systems International Deutsche Telekom Services Europe - Slovakia T-Mobile Polska T-Mobile Czech Republic a.s. Magenta Telekom OTE Group of Companies (HTO) Hrvatski Telekom Slovak Telekom

Elevate Your Tech Journey at the O(1) Tech Conference! Ready for a tech experience like no other? The O(1) Tech Conference is your golden ticket to an extraordinary adventure in the world of innovation, networking, and career growth. Here's why you should be excited: What's in Store? 3+ Inspiring Speakers: Get ready to be inspired by tech visionaries who've transformed the industry. 15+ Expert Mentors: Learn from the best in the business, with guidance to fuel your success. 10+ HR Partners: Connect with top companies and explore new career opportunities. 2+ Celebrity Guests: Rub shoulders with stars who've made a mark in the tech world. Save the Date: October 28, 2023 Where: Bengaluru, India It's Exclusive! This isn't your typical tech event. The O(1) Tech Conference is invite-only, and earning your invite is an exciting puzzle. Solve it, and you'll be on your way to an unforgettable experience. Who Should Attend? Techies at heart with at least 1 year of work experience. Those looking to advance their careers or explore new opportunities. Anyone hungry to meet, learn, and grow with like-minded tech enthusiasts. Why You Can't Miss It: Exclusive networking opportunities with tech leaders from the best companies in India. Get on the fast track with a career roadmap, mentorship, and valuable guidance. Gain real-world insights to stay ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving tech industry. Ready to Unlock Your Invite? Don't miss this chance to boost your career, connect with tech leaders, and explore the latest industry trends. Register your interest here: https://lnkd.in/dEcg2e87 Get ready to embark on an exhilarating tech journey at the O(1) Tech Conference. #O1TechConference #TechInnovation #CareerGrowth #TechCommunity Masai #masai

Join us in this captivating video as Roanne Steele, the Head of Digital Strategy at CES, shares her inspiring journey into the world of technology. Roanne takes us back to her university days, where she stumbled upon computers for the first time. Little did she know that this encounter would ignite a passion within her, leading her on a remarkable path in the tech industry. Roanne emphasizes that getting into tech is achievable for anyone. Surprisingly, only about 20% of technology is actually about the technology itself. The remaining 80% revolves around people. It is the driving force behind technological advancements. Roanne highlights the importance of being genuinely interested in people as the first step towards building a successful technical career. Looking towards the future, Roanne expresses her love for being in the technology field. She describes it as an amazing career and industry. However, she acknowledges the rapid pace of technological change. Roanne eagerly awaits what lies ahead, knowing that whatever she is doing today may not be the same in two or three years. The ever-evolving nature of technology keeps her on her toes, ready to embrace new opportunities and challenges. Don't miss out on this insightful video featuring Roanne Steele, where she shares her passion for technology and her anticipation for the future. #Techstep #techforward #techworld #techpeople

Thanks to Women in Tech forum for having me on their recent panel. We discussed a topic incredibly close to my heart around future proofing your career, career progression and challenging yourself. I truly believe that if you sit inside your comfort zone for too long then three things happen: 1. You stop learning and therefore you stop growing. The best opportunities to develop your skills, or gain new ones, nearly always happen outside that circle of safety we can be accustomed to reside in. 2. You miss out on opportunities entirely. If you don‚Äôt open yourself to consider different roles, projects, new technologies or responsibilities then these opportunities don‚Äôt even seek you out. It‚Äôs like sitting inside a closed box‚Ä¶. the chances simply fly over the top without recognition of you even being there. 3. New talent overtakes you. People who stay comfortable where they are miss chances to progress and literally open the door for others who are willing to take the step through. You can hear my top three takeaways below. #womenintech #womenempowerment #lifeatnetapp NetApp NetApp Women in Technology

Get ready for an unforgettable night of comedy with this year‚Äôs entertainment - Jerry Seinfeld! üéâ Celebrate with us! Join us for an exclusive Partner Reception. It‚Äôs our way of celebrating our mutual success and saying thank you for your partnership. Pack your suitcases, bring your walking shoes. #FashionTennisShoes Read the full article for more direct quotes from our executives on why they think partners like you should attend and experience #DellTechGPS activities while at Dell Technologies World! https://dell.to/3yfGHMN

#Forrester‚Äôs Technology & Innovation North America forum in Austin, Texas is fast approaching (September 10-12). If you are feeling restless like us to begin learning how technology is powering growth through our worldclass program, we have just the thing for you to get started a bit early! To kick off the T&I experience early, we want to give you the opportunity to assess the maturity of your current tech strategy and schedule a 1:1 meeting with one of our analysts in advance to discuss the results!
